Description.Text: W Retreat & Spa - Vieques Island is a modern 4-star hotel offering stylish accommodation in north Vieques. Highlights include a luxury spa, 24-hour gym, multiple dining options and an excellent location on a picturesque sandy beach. Vieques is an island of natural beauty with unspoiled shorelines and azure-coloured waters. It is an ideal destination for a relaxing getaway or an active outdoor adventure. Nearby places of interest include Puerto Mosquito, the family-friendly Red Beach and Vieques National Wildlife Refuge. The hotel occupies a modern low-rise building set on beautiful subtropical gardens. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, plunge pool, 24-hour gym, beauty salon, tennis courts and a spa complex offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Pool Oasis rooms are 67sqm and decorated in a modern, sophisticated style. They feature an outdoor patio with direct pool access. Amenities include cable TV, DVD player, iPod dock, coffee maker and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and separate walk-in shower. Sorce serves traditional Viequense cuisine in a casual beachfront setting, while Wet offers Mediterranean dishes by the pool. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the Living Room or W Cafe. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
